{%style%} .tabs { display: flex; list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; overflow: scroll; -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch; border-radius: 6px; width: auto; margin-bottom: 20px; padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; background: #f5f5f5; } @media (max-width: 750px) { .tabs { border-radius: 0; } } .tabs li::after { font-family: "Font Awesome 6 Free"; font-weight: 900; content: "\7c"; color: #d4d4d4; } .tabs li:nth-child(5)::after { content: ""!important; } .tabs::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; } .tabs li a { padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; white-space: nowrap!important; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold; margin: 5px; min-width: 50px; padding: 0 40px 10px; color: #84817a; text-align: center; } .tabs li .h3 { margin: 0!important; } .tabs li:hover a { color: black!important; } .tabs li a:hover { color: black; } .tabscroll_activeNavi a { color: black!important; border-bottom: solid 3px black; white-space: nowrap; } .tabs a { color: #84817a; text-decoration: none!important; white-space: nowrap; } @media (max-width: 750px) { .bar-tabs { position: relative; width: 100%; background-color: white; } .bar-tabs-gradient { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0; top: 0; pointer-events: none; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 1) -5%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 50%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 1) 130%); } } .tasting-notes img { height: 50px; width: auto; display: block; } @media (max-width: 750px) { .tasting-notes img { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; height: 40px; } } .beer-colour { border-radius: 50px; display: flex; flex-wrap: nowrap; background: rgb(255,216,120); background: -moz-linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,216,120,1) 0%, rgba(254,201,90,1) 8%, rgba(254,190,68,1) 16%, rgba(245,166,26,1) 24%, rgba(227,135,35,1) 32%, rgba(206,105,39,1) 40%, rgba(184,83,37,1) 48%, rgba(164,66,36,1) 56%, rgba(153,52,32,1) 64%, rgba(130,34,26,1) 72%, rgba(91,18,12,1) 80%, rgba(50,20,19,1) 88%, rgba(15,5,5,1) 96%); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,216,120,1) 0%, rgba(254,201,90,1) 8%, rgba(254,190,68,1) 16%, rgba(245,166,26,1) 24%, rgba(227,135,35,1) 32%, rgba(206,105,39,1) 40%, rgba(184,83,37,1) 48%, rgba(164,66,36,1) 56%, rgba(153,52,32,1) 64%, rgba(130,34,26,1) 72%, rgba(91,18,12,1) 80%, rgba(50,20,19,1) 88%, rgba(15,5,5,1) 96%); background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,216,120,1) 0%, rgba(254,201,90,1) 8%, rgba(254,190,68,1) 16%, rgba(245,166,26,1) 24%, rgba(227,135,35,1) 32%, rgba(206,105,39,1) 40%, rgba(184,83,37,1) 48%, rgba(164,66,36,1) 56%, rgba(153,52,32,1) 64%, rgba(130,34,26,1) 72%, rgba(91,18,12,1) 80%, rgba(50,20,19,1) 88%, rgba(15,5,5,1) 96%); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr="#ffd878",endColorstr="#0f0505",GradientType=1); } .beer-colour > div { width: 100%; text-align: center; line-height: 30px; font-size: 16px; color: white; vertical-align: middle; } .beer-color-active::before { font: var(--fa-font-solid); content: "\f00c"; font-size: 11px; margin-bottom: -2px; display: block; } .nutrition-highlight-container { display: flex; width: 800px; justify-content: space-between; } @media screen and (max-width: 800px) { .nutrition-highlight-container { width: auto; } .nutrition-highlight-container .nutrition-amount { font-size: 22px; } .nutrition-highlight-container .nutrition-nutrient { font-size: 20px; } .nutrition-highlight-container .nutrition-serving { font-size: 14px; } } .nutrition-highlight-container .nutrition-highlight { margin-right: 20px; } .nutrition-highlight-container .nutrition-highlight:last-child { margin-right: 0px; } .nutrition-amount { font-size: 24px; font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-weight: 500!important; } .nutrition-nutrient { font-size: 20px; font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-weight: 400!important; } .nutrition-serving { font-size: 16px; font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-weight: 300!important; } .table-nutrition { border-collapse:collapse; width: 800px; white-space: nowrap!important; } @media screen and (max-width: 800px) { .table-nutrition { width: 100%; } } .table-nutrition td:first-child { text-align: left; padding-left: 0px; } .table-nutrition td{ text-align: right; } .table-nutrition th, td { padding: 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; } .table-nutrition > tbody > tr:last-child { border-bottom: none; } .table-nutrition td i { font-size: 15px; color: #787878 } .table-nutrition thead tr th { font-weight: 500!important; font-size: 20px; font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif; text-align: right; } .table-nutrition th:first-child { text-align: left; padding-left: 0px; } {%endstyle%}
